column2: ALPHA BLACK TO PAPA BEAR. MORTON CLEARED. OVER.
ALL TEAMS. ASSAULT THE TOWN. GO GO GO. OVER.

HOTEL TO ALPHA. GET READY FOR EXTRACTION. OVER.
PAPA BEAR TO ALPHA BLACK. UNDERSTOOD. NOW GET OUT OF THERE. OVER.
PAPA BEAR TO ALPHA. WELCOME HOME. OVER.
